fields.name: Todos os Alunos
fields.users_query: from backend import db;from cruds.crud_course_section_students.models import CourseSectionStudents;from cruds.crud_users.models import Users;from cruds.crud_course_sections.models import CourseSections;teacher_id = $;teachers_course_sections = CourseSections.query.filter_by(teacher_id=teacher_id);course_sections = [CourseSectionStudents.query.filter_by(course_section_id=course_section.id, status = 1) for course_section in teachers_course_sections];users =[Users.query.get(course_section_student.user_id) for course_section in course_sections for course_section_student in course_section]

fields.name: Alunos de uma turma
fields.users_query: from backend import db;from cruds.crud_course_section_students.models import CourseSectionStudents;from cruds.crud_users.models import Users;course_section_students = CourseSectionStudents.query.filter_by(course_section_id=$, status=1);users = [Users.query.get(course_section_student.user_id) for course_section_student in course_section_students]
